code: import{connect}from"react-redux";import{receiveContent,receiveContentError,requestContent,toggleSampled}from"../action/Actions";import App from"../App";import{getSampled}from"../selector/AppStateSelector";import DBUtil from"../util/DBUtil";function mapStateToProps(state){return{sampled:getSampled(state)};}function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{toggleSampled:async(collection,sampled)=>{dispatch(toggleSampled());dispatch(requestContent());try{const content=await DBUtil.fetchPoemsByCollection(collection,sampled);dispatch(receiveContent(content));}catch(error){dispatch(receiveContentError(error));}}};}const AppContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(App);export default AppContainer;
